message: I'm starting with a generous offer, Bob. Let's see if you're feeling generous in return!
I'm not accepting your generous offer, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it!
Okay, Bob, let's try this again.  I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a fair share.
You're getting closer, but I'm not there yet. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to give away the whole farm!
I'm starting to think we're both being stubborn here. Let's find a middle ground and get this done.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's see if you're willing to make a bigger concession.
